title: Main Menu UI Zoom/Scroll
body:
After logging in, there's the screen that has "Store," "Crafting," "Champions," "Play," etc., but it seems really awkward. In the Store, there are three scrolls that move the focus of the box left-right, up-down, and up-down for lists. I have to constantly mess with the three scrolls just to use the search feature and still see everything. I've looked in settings and I can't find a "UI Scroll/Zoom" option, so I'm just getting tired.

Is there any way to fix this?

replies.body: It sounds like there may be an issue with your display resolution and the client's scaling. Could you snap a screenshot and upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/) or [Gyazo](https://gyazo.com/), then post the link here? This will give me a better idea of what's going on. Thanks!

Maybe you didn't get a notification, or maybe you're working on it and I'm being impatient. I don't know. I'll repost the Gyazo.
https://gyazo.com/d6567c71b52631f8ffd9b9822f0f8cf9

Ah, yeah I didn't get a notification for your other post because it wasn't a reply to my comment. I'm not able to determine your desktop display resolution, but I recommend trying to resize the client until the bars don't show up anymore. You can do so by grabbing the bottom right corner of your client window and while holding down a left click, dragging outwards to expand the size of the client. Below is a screenshot to assist you.

(Click to Enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/SX0pd

Let me know if this helped.

https://gyazo.com/da2f68ec93ced17eb8cdf8c13ff102a1

https://gyazo.com/2b7b6d742bf133b7504cc93cb37e9d7d

It removed that problem, but now I can't see a small chunk of the screen at all. I'm unfortunately unable to find a middle ground. My resolution is 1366 x 768.

Since you're still having issues with this, I recommend reaching out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket. ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), you'll provide data necessary for us to work with you and resolve this for good.

If you have any questions, let me know.

Here's a Gyazo of it
https://gyazo.com/d6567c71b52631f8ffd9b9822f0f8cf9
There are the scroll bars that I have to mess with to get to see everything in the Store, and it's only in the Store.
